com.mariangolea.fintracker.banks.csvparser.api.transaction

Class BankTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mariangolea.fintracker.banks.csvparser.api.transaction.BankTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class BankTransaction
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Container of both parsed and raw csv data for any transaction.
    Author:
    mariangolea@gmail.com
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankTransaction

        public BankTransaction(boolean validatedDuringParse,
                       boolean transactionTargetIdentified,
                       String title,
                       Date startDate,
                       Date completedDate,
                       BigDecimal amount,
                       String description,
                       BankTransaction.Type type,
                       List<String> csvContent)
        Create a bank transaction instance.
        Parameters:
        validatedDuringParse - if parser supports strict validation (amounts and company ID) and validation went OK.
        transactionTargetIdentified - if parser supports company string identification and it was found.
        title - transaction type as a string.
        startDate - date when transaction has been initiated by the client.
        completedDate - date of transaction settlement.
        amount - currency amount
        description - transaction description (useful for a client to re categorize a certain transaction).
        type - transaction type
        csvContent - original csv content.

    • Method Detail

      • transactionTargetIdentified

        public boolean transactionTargetIdentified()
        Whether transaction target (usually a company) was identified. AbstractBankParser.createCompanyIdDescriptionTransaction(java.lang.String, java.util.Date, java.util.Date, java.math.BigDecimal, java.lang.String, com.mariangolea.fintracker.banks.csvparser.api.transaction.BankTransaction.Type, java.util.List<java.lang.String>)
        Returns:

      • isValidatedDuringParse

        public boolean isValidatedDuringParse()
        Whether the transaction was validated during parse. AbstractBankParser.createStrictDescriptionTransaction(java.lang.String, java.util.Date, java.util.Date, java.math.BigDecimal, java.lang.String, com.mariangolea.fintracker.banks.csvparser.api.transaction.BankTransaction.Type, java.util.List<java.lang.String>)
        Returns:
        true if transactionTargetIdentified returns true, and in case amount validation was supported, it also returned true.

      • getStartDate

        public final Date getCompletedDate()
        Get the Date object for when this transaction was settled by the bank.

      • getAmount

        public final BigDecimal getAmount()
        Amount of currency spent on this transaction.
        Returns:
        at least BigDecimal.ZERO

      • getDescription

        public final String getDescription()
        Every transaction contains a certain description.
        Each parser expects a hard coded list of transaction descriptions for which it can translate this content to something more meaningful to the user.
        Returns:
        meaningful adaptation (company string), or all description string from CSV content when transaction identification fails or is obsolete.

      • getType

        public final BankTransaction.Type getType()
        Whether this is a outgoing or incoming currency transaction.
        Returns:

      • getTitle

        public final String getTitle()
        Each parser is aware of a hard coded list of transaction "types" it knows (POS operations, credit payments, and so on).
        Whenever that happens, title will contain a short string version which makes sense to the user.
        Otherwise, it contains the full string found, allowing user to edit it.
        Returns:

      • getCsvContent

        public final List<String> getCsvContent()
        Get the full list of String lines of CSV text that this transaction was parsed from.
        Returns:

      • getOriginalCSVContentLinesNumber

        public final int getOriginalCSVContentLinesNumber()
        Get the number of CSV lines of text which were parsed for this transaction.
        Returns:
